mean_cn: n. 求援（对象），求助（对象，【商】【律】追索权
mean_en: an opportunity or choice to use or do something in order to deal with a problem or situation
word_etyma: re回，向后+course跑，发生→跑回来→求助
sentence: After nobody rescued us from the island, our last recourse was to paint "S-O-S" on the rocks and hope a plane saw it.
sentence_trans: 由于岛上没人营救，我们最后的求助方式就是在石头上画上“S-O-S”， 祈求某架飞机能够看到。
